text: William John Keating (March 30, 1927 - May 20, 2020) was an American businessman and politician of the Republican Party. From 1967-70, he served on the Cincinnati City Council.William J. Keating profile, bioguide.congress.gov; accessed August 22, 2017. Keating served in the United States House of Representatives from 1971-74, representing Ohio's 1st congressional district. Keating resigned from Congress to become President and CEO of The Cincinnati Enquirer.Keating giving up seat for post at newspaper, news.google.com; accessed August 22, 2017. Keating was a founding member of the law firm Keating, Muething and Klekamp. Keating died on May 20, 2020 in Cincinnati at the age of 93.Law firm founder and former congressman Bill Keating Sr. dies at 93 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1927 births Category:2020 deaths Category:United States representatives from Ohio Category:Businesspeople from Cincinnati Category:Politicians from Cincinnati Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: William J. Keating
